embed.description: Which relationships should be embedded in the response

per_page.description: Number of entries returned per page

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve

ListArticles.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of all articles

ListCases.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of all cases

ListCompanies.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of all companies

ListCustomFields.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of all custom fields

ListCustomers.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of all customers

ListFilters.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of all filters

ListGroups.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of all groups

ListIntegrationUrls.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of all integration URLs

ListMacros.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of all macros

ListTopics.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of all topics

ListUsers.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of all users

ListArticleTranslations.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of translations for a particular article

article_id.description: The ID of the article to retrieve translations for

ListCaseReplies.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of replies for a particular case

case_id.description: The ID of the case to retrieve replies for

ListCaseNotes.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of notes for a particular case

case_id.description: The ID of the case to retrieve notes for

ListCompanyCustomers.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of customers for a particular company

company_id.description: The ID of the company to retrieve customers for

ListCustomerCases.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of cases for a particular customer

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer to retrieve cases for

ListFilterCases.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of cases for a particular filter

filter_id.description: The ID of the filter to retrieve cases for

ListGroupFilters.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of filters for a particular group

group_id.description: The ID of the group to retrieve filters for

ListGroupUsers.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of users for a particular group

group_id.description: The ID of the group to retrieve users for

ListMacroActions.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of actions for a particular macro

macro_id.description: The ID of the macro to retrieve actions for

ListTopicArticles.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of articles for a particular topic

topic_id.description: The ID of the topic to retrieve articles for

ListTopicTranslations.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of translations for a particular topic

topic_id.description: The ID of the topic to retrieve translations for

text.description: Search terms -- will search across subject, body_text, keywords, question, and answer fields

topic_ids.description: Topic IDs to filter results by

SearchCases.summary: Search cases based on a combination of parameters with pagination

name.description: Search for cases from customers with particular names

first_name.description: Search for cases from customers with particular first names

last_name.description: Search for cases from customers with particular last names

email.description: Search for cases from customers with particular email addresses

phone.description: Search for cases from customers with particular phone numbers

company.description: Search for cases from customers with particular company names

twitter.description: Search for cases from customers with particular twitter handles

labels.description: Search for cases from customers with particular labels

assigned_group.description: Assigned group name to filter by

assigned_user.description: Assigned user name to filter by

channels.description: Case channel types to filter by

attachments.description: Case attachment file names to search for

created.description: Creation date range to filter by

updated.description: Updated date range to filter by

since_created_at.description: Search for cases created more recently than a particular date

max_created_at.description: Search for cases created on or before a particular date

since_updated_at.description: Search for cases updated more recently than a particular date

max_updated_at.description: Search for cases updated on or before a particular date

since_id.description: Search for cases with an ID greater than a particular ID

max_id.description: Search for cases with an ID less than or equal to a particular ID

SearchCustomers.summary: Search customers based on a combination of parameters with pagination

first_name.description: Customer's first name to search for

last_name.description: Customer's last name to search for

full_name.description: Customer's first and last name (concatenated) to search for

since_created_at.description: Search for customers created more recently than a particular date

max_created_at.description: Search for customers created on or before a particular date

since_updated_at.description: Search for customers updated more recently than a particular date

max_updated_at.description: Search for customers updated on or before a particular date

since_id.description: Search for customers with an ID greater than a particular ID

max_id.description: Search for customers with an ID less than or equal to a particular ID

email.description: Customer's email address to search for

twitter.description: Customer's twitter handle to search for

phone.description: Customer's phone number to search for

external_id.description: Customer's external ID to search for

ShowCase.summary: Retrieve a single case by ID

ShowCompany.summary: Retrieve a single company by ID

ShowCustomField.summary: Retrieve a single custom field by ID

ShowCustomer.summary: Retrieve a single customer by ID

ShowMacro.summary: Retrieve a single macro by ID

ShowTopic.summary: Retrieve a single topic by ID

ShowUser.summary: Retrieve a single user by ID

ShowInsightMeta.summary: Retrieve insights meta data for the authenticated site

ShowArticleTranslation.summary: Retrieve a single article translation by article ID and locale

article_id.description: The ID of the article to retrieve the translation for

locale.description: The locale of the translation to retrieve

ShowCaseMessage.summary: Retrieve the original message for a particular case

ShowCaseReply.summary: Retrieve a single case reply by case ID and reply ID

ShowCaseNote.summary: Retrieve a single private case note by case ID and note ID

ShowMacroAction.summary: Retrieve a single macro action by macro ID and action ID

ShowTopicTranslation.summary: Retrieve a single topic translation by article ID and locale

topic_id.description: The ID of the topic to retrieve the translation for

locale.description: The locale of the translation to retrieve

topic_id.description: The topic to which the new article is assigned

customer_id.description: The customer that submitted this case

assigned_user_id.description: The user assigned to this case

assigned_group_id.description: The group assigned to this case

locked_by_id.description: User currently working on this case

entered_by_id.description: The support agent that entered the first phone interaction

company_id.description: ID of company to assign to this customer

CreateCaseReply.summary: Create a new case reply for a particular case

CreateTopicTranslation.summary: Create a new translation for a particular topic

DeleteArticle.summary: Delete a single article by ID

DeleteIntegrationUrl.summary: Delete a single integration URL by ID

DeleteMacro.summary: Delete a single macro by ID

DeleteTopic.summary: Delete a single topic by ID

DeleteTopicTranslation.summary: Delete a single topic translation by topic ID and locale

topic_id.description: The ID of the topic to delete the translation from

locale.description: The locale of the translation to delete

total_entries.description: Total number of entries on all pages of the result

body_auto.description: Whether to just use the content from 'body'

ArticleModel.in_support_center.description: Whether to display the article in the support center

ArticleModel.position.description: The position of the article as displayed in the support center

ArticleModel.quickcode.description: Code used by the agent to quickly add article content to a case

ArticleModel.publish_at.output.description: Date the article is to be published

ArticleModel.publish_at.input.description: Date the article is to be published

ArticleModel.body.description: The content of the article (HTML formatted)

ArticleModel.internal_notes.description: Notes to the agent using the article

ArticleTranslation.body.description: The content of the article (HTML formatted)

ArticleTranslation.publish_at.description: Date the article is to be published

CaseModel.external_id.description: Unique external identifier to reference this case to an external system

CaseModel.priority.description: Priority of the case (1-10, 1 is lowest priority)

CaseModel.labels.description: Array of labels associated with this case

CaseModel.custom_fields.description: Hash of values for custom fields

CaseModel.active_at.output.description: Time the case was last active

CaseModel.active_at.input.description: Time the case was last active

CaseModel.received_at.output.description: Time the most recent message was received

CaseModel.received_at.input.description: Time the most recent message was received

CaseModel.locked_until.output.description: Time at which the lock on this case will expire

CaseModel.locked_until.input.description: Time at which the lock on this case will expire

CaseMessageModel.from.description: The from address of the message

CaseMessageModel.to.description: The to address of the message

CaseMessageModel.cc.description: The CC address(es) of the message

CaseMessageModel.bcc.description: The BCC address(es) of the message

CaseMessageModel.hidden_at.description: Time at which this answer was hidden from the support center

CaseReplyModel.from.description: The from address of the message

CaseReplyModel.to.description: The to address of the message

CaseReplyModel.cc.description: The CC address(es) of the message

CaseReplyModel.bcc.description: The BCC address(es) of the message

CaseReplyModel.hidden_at.output.description: Time at which this answer was hidden from the support center

CaseReplyModel.hidden_at.input.description: Time at which this answer was hidden from the support center

CaseNoteModel.erased_at.description: Time at which an agent erased this note

CompanyModel.domains.description: Array of top-level domain names for the company

CompanyModel.custom_fields.description: Hash of values for custom fields

CustomFieldModel.active.description: Whether or not this custom field is active

CustomerModel.external_id.description: The customer's unique external identifier to reference this customer in an external system

CustomerModel.background.description: Any background information for the customer

CustomerModel.language.description: The customer's language code -- NULL unless multi-lingual support is enabled

CustomerModel.locked_until.description: Time at which the lock on the customer will expire

CustomerModel.created_at.description: Time at which the customer was created

CustomerModel.updated_at.description: Time at which the customer was last updated at

CustomerModel.emails.description: Array of e-mail objects, each specifying the contact type and value of the e-mail address

CustomerModel.phone_numbers.description: Array of phone number objects, each specifying the contact type and value of the phone number

CustomerModel.addresses.description: Array of address objects, each specifying the contact type and value of the location

CustomerModel.custom_fields.description: Associative array of values for custom fields

FilterModel.position.description: The position of the filter in the list of filters

FilterModel.active.description: Whether or not this filter is active

IntegrationUrlModel.enabled.description: Whether or not the integration URL is enabled for use

IntegrationUrlModel.markup.description: Liquid code to parse which creates the rendered URL

IntegrationUrlModel.created_at.description: When the integration URL was created

IntegrationUrlModel.updated_at.description: When the integration URL was last updated

MacroModel.enabled.description: Whether or not the macro is enabled for use

MacroModel.folders.description: Array of folders associated with this macro

MacroActionModel.type.description: The type of action to be performed

MacroActionModel.value.description: Value to set for the given type

MacroActionModel.enabled.description: Whether or not the action is enabled

MacroActionModel.updated_at.description: When the action was last updated

TopicModel.name.description: Subject of the topic in the default locale

TopicModel.description.description: An optional description of the topic

TopicModel.position.description: The topic's position in the admin UI

TopicModel.allow_questions.description: Whether to allow customers to post questions about this topic in your support center

TopicModel.in_support_center.description: Whether to show this topic in the support center

TopicModel.created_at.description: Time when the topic was created

TopicModel.updated_at.description: Time when the topic was updated

TopicTranslationModel.name.description: The topic's name translated in the locale

TopicTranslationModel.created_at.description: Time when the translation was created

TopicTranslationModel.updated_at.description: Time when the translation was last updated

UserModel.public_name.description: Public facing name of the user
